revised_title: Discovery of Ancient Artifacts and a Mysterious Lamp in the Tevere Inundation
tldr: The author describes the effects of the Tevere River's inundation in Rome, which revealed several unknown vaults and artifacts. One of these vaults contained a mysterious lamp made of a waxy material that hardened in the cold air. The author is unsure if it is a perpetual lamp mentioned by the ancients and plans to investigate further.
